LUI $t0 0XFFFF
SRL $t0 $t0 0X10

LUI $t1 0X1000
LUI $t2 0X0028
SRL $t2 $t2 0X10
ADDU $t1 $t1 $t2

J 0xA

SRL $t0 $t0 0X00
SRL $v0 $t0 0X1F
SRL $v0 $t0 0X1F

SRL $v0 $t0 0X00

JR $ra

should skip to SRL line before JR and not change t0 and output 255
